title: Economic Mobility and Social Capital in the US
description: An interactive visualization exploring economic mobility and social capital across US counties, schools, and colleges.
dek: An interactive visualization exploring economic mobility and social capital across US counties, schools, and colleges.

introExplanation.value: This visualization explores economic connectedness and social capital metrics from the Social Capital Atlas dataset.

miscExplanation.value: Built using The Pudding's Svelte Starter. Data from Social Capital Atlas Dataset by Chetty et al.
